#summary Returns HTML select tags for choosing year, month and day.
#labels method,view,date,form

You can pass in a different order to change the order in which the select tags appear on the page. You can also exclude one select tag completely by specifying an order with only one or two items. You can also change the separator character that goes between the select tags.

|| *Name* || *Required* || *Type* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| order || no || list || "month,day,year" || use to change the order of or exclude select tags ||
|| separator || no || string || " " || use to change the character that is displayed between the select tags ||

*Examples:*

{{{
#dateSelectTag(order="year,month,day")#
}}}
